analysis.description:
Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#164-176) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,feeAccountToken,_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000)) (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#170-171)
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value.sub(_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000))) (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#171-174)

Reentrancy in Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#164-176):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _value) (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#170)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,feeAccountToken,_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000)) (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#170-171)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value.sub(_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000))) (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#171-174)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payment (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#174-175)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/16/0xcf19cfee14e161d339a084993b2cb18b7eaec773.sol#76)
